scripts.//: use npm run --filter server build or dev or production
scripts.dev: npm run dev:client & npm run dev:server
scripts.start: npm run start:client & npm run start:server
scripts.build: npm run build:client & npm run build:server
scripts.build:server: cd apps/server && prisma generate && npm run build
scripts.start:server: cd apps/server && prisma generate && npm run start:prod
